item.title: Lost Paradise: Remembering Mermaids Casino - A Vintage Las Vegas Gem
item.description:
From Silver Palace to Seaside Escape: A History of Transformation

Mermaids Casino, a nostalgic beacon on Fremont Street, sadly ceased to exist in 2016, a casualty of Las Vegas’ ever-changing landscape. But its memory remains vibrant in the minds of those who frequented its quirky, island-themed interior. Its story isn’t just about Mermaids, though; it’s a microcosm of downtown Las Vegas’ evolution, a testament to the constant churn of casinos and concepts that define the city’s history.
